Text.Page:
The sikandaris wish to regain control of their Hatchery and we'll oblige them.

Killian brought in some ebon fimbrilisks, probably to keep the argons and the sikandaris in line, and they must die.

With the fimbrilisks dead, we can work on clearing out the argons.

We must hope the sikandaris recognize we're taking the high road, helping them in spite of what they did to us.

The goal had better be worth the price.
